metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20446 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In AlwaysOnHotwordDetector of AlwaysOnHotwordDetector.java, there is a possible way to access the microphone from the background due to a missing permission check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11Android ID: A-229793943

criterions.comment: android-framework-23: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
